titles.title: Compound 1080 and Sodium Cyanide Elimination Act
Compound 1080 and Sodium Cyanide Elimination Act

To amend the Toxic Substances Control Act to prohibit the use, production, sale, importation, or exportation of the poison sodium fluoroacetate (known as "Compound 1080") and to prohibit the use of sodium cyanide for predator control.

bill.summary:
Compound 1080 and Sodium Cyanide Elimination Act - Amends the Toxic Substances Control Act (TSCA) to prohibit the use, production, sale, importation, or exportation of sodium fluoroacetate (known as Compound 1080).
Prohibits the use of sodium cyanide in a predator control device.
Subjects a violator of either such prohibition to a fine, imprisonment for not more than two years, or both.
